textContent:
-Book review deadline extension
Mum's location with regards to insurgency and this affecting not only mental health but also creating financial difficulties. 
Has been referenced before to the finance team and used to secure fees payment in instalments.
Make it mild and don't make it too focused on working so as to not give the impression she's working not schooling.

favorite color - purple

I'll keep short because of our extension letter, but in your purple lights, no emotion, moment nor elation is short. I stare into your eyes and lose myself for a thousand years. I look at your body and feel a new sense of happiness. I speak to you and hear echoes of cosmic grandeur. I be with you and experience an experience exclusive only to the beautiful ruth waziri.
title: Waziri
textContentHtml:
-Book review deadline extension

Mum's location with regards to insurgency and this affecting not only mental health but also creating financial difficulties. 

Has been referenced before to the finance team and used to secure fees payment in instalments.

Make it mild and don't make it too focused on working so as to not give the impression she's working not schooling.


favorite color - purple


I'll keep short because of our extension letter, but in your purple lights, no emotion, moment nor elation is short. I stare into your eyes and lose myself for a thousand years. I look at your body and feel a new sense of happiness. I speak to you and hear echoes of cosmic grandeur. I be with you and experience an experience exclusive only to the beautiful ruth waziri.
